This is a simple Google Chrome extension designed to convert long URLs into short URLs using our domain, DotLynk.
Short URL Example: https://www.dotlynk.com/001R
No matter how long the original URL is, it will always return a 4-character short URL after our domain.

Features:
After installing the extension, you will have two options:

Enter the URL manually.
Use the "Get Current URL" button to automatically capture the URL of the currently open tab.
Once youâ€™ve either entered a URL manually or clicked the "Get Current URL" button, you can click the "Shorten URL" button to generate a short URL.

Output:
The generated short URL will be displayed at the bottom.

You can either:
Copy the URL to your clipboard, or
Click the URL to open it in a new tab.
